description: This file defines the report generation service for AI trends in mechanical engineering, including an interface and its implementation that creates and retrieves .docx reports containing trend data formatted with OpenXML.

classes.name: IReportService
classes.description: Interface defining methods for generating and retrieving reports.

classes.name: ReportService
classes.description: Implementation of IReportService that generates .docx reports from trends and stores them in-memory.

methods.name: GenerateReport
methods.description: Creates a new report document based on provided trends and stores it in a concurrent dictionary.

methods.name: TryGetReport
methods.description: Attempts to retrieve a stored report by its GUID.

methods.name: BuildDocx
methods.description: Constructs a minimal .docx document with headers and a bullet list of trend data.

methods.name: CreateParagraph
methods.description: Helper to create a formatted paragraph with optional styling.

methods.name: CreateBulletParagraph
methods.description: Helper to create a paragraph formatted as a bullet point at a specified indentation level.

methods.name: EnsureNumberingDefinitions
methods.description: Sets up bullet list numbering styles within the Word document to properly format nested lists.
